_header: As for farewell farewell farewell farewell
_description: Parting is grievous — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
AS for farewel farewel farewel farewelAnd of farewel more þen
                    a þousand skore…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Albe y fer forget me nevyrTo eft sone þat y may yow more
                    biwray
